item.title: NeMLA 2025 in Philadelphia
item.description: I'm chairing "Contemporary Cyberfeminisms," presenting on "Reading Reading," & attending all the Women's & Gender Studies Caucus special events. Come say hi!

item.title: ACLA 2025
item.description: I'm presenting on Jennifer Egan's "vision" trilogy (<cite>Look at Me</cite>, <cite>A Visit from the Goon Squad</cite>, <cite>The Candy House</cite>) for the seminar "Future Memory: Intersections of Memory, Technology, and Narrative in Literature and Film Across Time."

item.title: CFP for NeMLA 2026
item.description: Abstract submissions are now open for "Regenerating Technical Communication: Creative Pedagogies & Practices," a roundtable I'm organizing for NeMLA 2026.
